thread.title: Lord Snowdon, royal photographer, dies aged 86
thread.title_full: Lord Snowdon, royal photographer, dies aged 86

author: Staff and agencies
title: Lord Snowdon, royal photographer, dies aged 86
text:
Lord Snowdon, royal photographer, dies aged 86 
Former husband of the late Princess Margaret dies peacefully at home Lord Snowdon attending the funeral of Princess Margaret in 2002. Photograph: PA Staff and agencies   15.14   15.22   
Lord Snowdon, the renowned photographer and former husband of Princess Margaret, has died peacefully at his home at the age of 86, a family spokesman has said. 
Born Anthony Armstrong-Jones, he died peacefully at his home on Friday, according to his picture agency Camera Press. 
Buckingham Palace said the Queen had been informed, but did not comment further. 
He and Princess Margaret had two children, Viscount Linley and Lady Sarah Chatto. WIth his second wife Lucy Lindsay-Hogg - from whom he split in 2000 - he had a daughter, Lady Frances Armstrong-Jones. He also had a son, Jasper, with Melanie Cable-Alexander, a journalist. 
More details soon ...
